Ability.Name: Kolto Probe

Description.OldValue: Summons a droid that heals a friendly target for <<1[%d/%d/%d]>> over <<2[%d/%d/%d]>> seconds.

Ability.Description: Summons a droid that heals a friendly target for <<1[%d/%d/%d]>> over <<2[%d/%d/%d]>> seconds. Stacks up to 2 times.

Ability.Name: Surgical Precision

Description.OldValue: Increases the healing dealt by Surgical Probe and Kolto Injection by 5% and increases the max stack limit of Tactical Advantage by 1. In addition, Surgical Probe immediately re-grants Tactical Advantage once every 10 seconds.

Ability.Description: Increases the healing dealt by Surgical Probe by 5% and increases the max stack limit of Tactical Advantage by 1. In addition, Surgical Probe immediately re-grants Tactical Advantage once every 10 seconds.

Ability.Name: Kolto Shot
Ability.Description: Heals a friendly target for <<1>>.

Description.OldValue: While in Combat Support Cylinder or Combat Support Cell the duration of Supercharged Gas and Supercharge Cells is increased by 3 seconds.

Ability.Description: While in Combat Support Cylinder or Combat Support Cell the duration of Supercharged Gas and Supercharge Cells is increased by 5 seconds.

Ability.Name: Benevolence
Ability.Description: Heals a friendly target for <<1>> health.

Ability.Name: Noble Sacrifice

Description.OldValue: Restores 15 Force and deals <<1>> elemental damage to an enemy target or heals a friendly target for <<2>> health.

Ability.Description: Sacrifices 15% of your maximum health to restore 8% of your maximum Force. Each time this ability is used, your Force regeneration rate is reduced by 25% for the next <<1>> seconds. Stacks up to 4 times.

Ability.Name: Rejuvenate
Ability.Description: Immediately heals a target for a <<1>>, plus an additional <<2>> over <<3>> seconds.

Ability.Name: Deliverance
Ability.Description: Heals a friendly target for <<1>> health.

Ability.Name: Healing Trance
Ability.Description: Heals a friendly target for <<1>> health and consumes 40 Force over the channel duration.

Ability.Name: Resplendence

Description.OldValue: Healing Trance critical hits grant 1 charge of Resplendence, which improves the effectiveness of your next Noble Sacrifice or Salvation. Noble Sacrifice: Restores an additional 5 Force and consumes 1 charge. Salvation: Consumes 5 less Force per charge and reduces activation time by 0.25 seconds for each of the first two charges, or makes it activate instantly with the third charge. Consumes all charges.

Ability.Description: Healing Trance critical hits grant 1 charge of Resplendence, which improves the effectiveness of your next Noble Sacrifice or Salvation. Noble Sacrifice: Activates without degenerating your Force or causing a global cooldown and consumes 1 charge. Salvation: Consumes 5 less Force per charge and reduces activation time by 0.25 seconds for each of the first two charges, or makes it activate instantly with the third charge. Consumes all charges.

Ability.Name: Salvation
Ability.Description: Applies a periodic healing effect to up to 8 allies within 8 meters of the targeted area, which heals for <<1>> over <<2>> seconds. Once a target has received the periodic healing effect, the target may leave the area and will continue to be healed by the effect.

Ability.Name: Wandering Mend
Ability.Description: Places a mending Force on a friendly target that heals them for <<1>> health the next time they take damage. After healing the target, Wandering Mend travels to another friendly target within 20 meters. Wandering Mend lasts up to <<2>> seconds on each target and travels up to 3 times, healing up to 4 targets. Wandering Mend can only be placed on one target at a time.

Ability.Name: Cauterize
Ability.Description: Strikes the target for <<1>> weapon damage and deals an additional <<2>> elemental damage over <<3[%d seconds/%d second/%d seconds]>>. Requires two lightsabers.

Ability.Name: Merciless Zeal

Description.OldValue: Critical hits with burn effects heal you for 1% of your maximum health.

Ability.Description: Your Cauterize, Overload Saber, adn Force Melt burns heal you for 15% of the damage they deal.

Ability.Name: Consumption

Description.OldValue: Restores 15 Force and deals <<1>> elemental damage to an enemy target or heals a friendly target for <<2>> health.

Ability.Description: Consumes 15% of your maximum health to restore 8% of your maximum Force. Each time this ability is used, your Force regeneration rate is reduced by 25% for the next <<1>> seconds. Stacks up to 4 times.

Ability.Name: Dark Heal
Ability.Description: Heals a friendly target for <<1>> health.

Ability.Name: Resurgence
Ability.Description: Immediately heals the target for <<1>>, plus an additional <<2>> over <<3>> seconds.

Ability.Name: Dark Infusion
Ability.Description: Heals a friendly target for <<1>> health.

Ability.Name: Force Surge

Description.OldValue: Innervate critical heals grant 1 charge of Force Surge, which improves the effectiveness of your next Consumption or Revivification. Consumption: Restores an additional 5 Force and consumes 1 charge. Revivification: Consumes 5 less Force per charge and reduces activation time by 0.25 seconds for each of the first two charges, or makes it activate instantly with the third charge. Consumes all charges.

Ability.Description: Innervate critical heals grant 1 charge of Force Surge, which improves the effectiveness of your next Consumption or Revivification. Consumption: Activates without degenerating your Force or causing a global cooldown and consumes 1 charge. Revivification: Consumes 5 less Force per charge and reduces activation time by 0.25 seconds for each of the first two charges, or makes it activate instantly with the third charge. Consumes all charges.

Ability.Name: Innervate
Ability.Description: Heals a friendly target for <<1>> health and consumes 40 Force over the channel duration.

Ability.Name: Revivification
Ability.Description: Applies a periodic healing effect to up to 8 allies within 8 meters of the targeted area, which heals for <<1>> over <<2>> seconds. Once a target has received the periodic healing effect, the target may leave the area and will continue to be healed by the effect.

Ability.Name: Roaming Mend
Ability.Description: Places a mending Force on a friendly target that heals them for <<1>> health the next time they take damage. After healing the target, Roaming Mend travels to another friendly target within 20 meters. Roaming Mend lasts up to <<2>> seconds on each target and travels up to 3 times, healing up to 4 targets. Roaming Mend can only be placed on one target at a time.

Ability.Name: Hungering

Description.OldValue: Critical hits with bleed effects heal you for 1% of your maximum health.

Ability.Description: Your Rupture, Deadly Saber, adn Force Rend bleeds heal you for 15% of the damage they deal.

Ability.Name: Rupture
Ability.Description: Stabs the target for <<1>> weapon damage and deals an additional <<2>> internal damage over <<3[%d seconds/%d second/%d seconds]>>. Requires two lightsabers.

Ability.Name: Emergent Emergencies

Description.OldValue: Increases the healing dealt by Emergency Medpac and Underworld Medicine by 5% and increases the max stack limit of Upper Hand by 1. In addition, Emergency Medpac immediately regrants Upper Hand once every 10 seconds.

Ability.Description: Increases the healing dealt by Emergency Medpac by 5% and increases the max stack limit of Upper Hand by 1. In addition, Emergency Medpac immediately regrants Upper Hand once every 10 seconds.

Ability.Name: Slow-release Medpac

Description.OldValue: Injects the target with slow-release medicine that heals for <<1[%d/%d/%d]>> over <<2[%d/%d/%d]>> seconds.

Ability.Description: Injects the target with slow-release medicine that heals for <<1[%d/%d/%d]>> over <<2[%d/%d/%d]>> seconds. Stacks up to 2 times.

Ability.Name: Med Shot
Ability.Description: Fires a quick stream of bolts, causing <<1>> healing.

Ability.Description: Increases your movement speed by 15% and the movement speed bonus of Force Camouflage by 20%. Additionally, increases the duration of Force Camouflage by 2 seconds.

Ability.Name: Force Barrier
Ability.Description: Projects a Force Barrier around you, granting immunity to all control, damage, and negative effects while channeled. This ability does not respect the global cooldown and can be used while controlled. While you are protected by Force Barrier charges will build up and grant Enduring Bastion, a shield that absorbs an amount of damage based off the charges that are present when Force Barrier ended. Enduring Bastion also grants immunity to interrupts.

Ability.Description: Innervate critical heals grant 1 charge of Force Surge, which improves the effectiveness of your next Consumption or Revivification. Consumption: Restores an additional 5 Force and consumes 1 charge. Revivification: Consumes 5 less Force per charge and reduces activation time by 0.25 seconds for each of the first two charges, or makes it activate instantly with the third charge. Consumes all charges.

Roaming Mend can only be placed on one target at a time.

Ability.Name: Unremitting
Ability.Description: While in Shien Form, Force Leap grants Unremitting, reducing all damage taken by 20% and granting immunity to interrupts and all controlling effects for <<1>> seconds.

Ability.Name: Unstoppable
Ability.Description: While in Shien Form, Force Charge grants Unstoppable, increasing damage reduction by 20% and granting immunity to interrupts and all controlling effects for <<1>> seconds.
